extendedInfo.description: Spensa Pro is now the #1 Professional Financial Manager for Android. It gives you all the tools and flexibility you need to keep your finances in order. Just check the list and if you miss any feature you just let us know and we will take care of it.â¢	Accounts and subaccounts. It is the only app in the Market with subaccounts. It is a powerful tool to organize all your expenses according to your personal and professional needs.â¢	Multiple Currencies. Donât worry if you have accounts with different currencies or you travel abroad frequently. Spensa Pro will do all the conversions for you. It will give you the total balance of all your accounts according the current exchange currency rates in the market. If you are not connected to internet the app will use the info stored in the Database.â¢	Syncing. We mean true syncing and not just copying a database from one device to another. You can sync any number of devices. You and your spouse can add or delete any transaction at any time and sync at any time to share all the information. The app also sync automatically.â¢	Graph of what your balance would be in the future according to recurring transactions.â¢	Customizable Categories and sub-categories. Add or delete any category and subcategory at any time. Choose between more than 1,000 professional icons to make it easy to track your expenses. Keep the categories in the order you prefer.â¢	Filters. The Filters are the one characteristic that makes this app the more flexible Financial Manager in the market. In any list, graph or balance you can filter any number of accounts and/or categories to get the info of only those that you are interested in.â¢	Graphs. In one look you have all the information you want by day, week, month, year or any period of time you want. You can choose between pie and bar graphs. â¢	Recurring Transactions. You have total flexibility for your recurring transactions. Choose by any number of days, weeks, months, or years. Choose if you want the transactions be generated automatically when the time arrives or set an alarm to remind you to do so.â¢	Backups. Feel totally safe about the info you have. Every time you make changes to the database a backup will be created and stored for you in the cloud. You will be able to restore any of the backups at any time.â¢	Debt Calculator. Plan your payments knowing is going to take you to get rid of your debt and the total of interest fees you are going to pay.â¢	Tags. You can add a tag to any category and keep track, for example, of the mileage when you charge gasoline or take the car to the mechanic. You can choose between lists, numeric and text tags.â¢	Transfers. Make your transfers between accounts with just one transaction.â¢	Bank Statement. Donât suffer anymore every time you have to do your Bank reconciliation. You have a screen with several tools that it will help you in this task and make it easy and even enjoyable!â¢	Budget. Create your budget with any combination of Groups and/or categories, Accounts and/or Sub-accounts. It is totally customizable and flexible.â¢	Projects. Besides the categories and sub-accounts you can group your expenses in Projects to help you not to spend too much in your next vacation trip for example.â¢	Photo receipts. Keep a digital copy of your receipts for your records.â¢	Calculators. The app supplies a Tip, Taxes and Exchange Currency calculator to make these tasks easy and fun. Automatically, the total is added in the transactions with the due comments. You will be able to keep track of exchange rates or taxes of each one of your transactions.â¢	Security. Lock the app with a password.â¢	Import and Export. Import from and Export to a CSV file all your information you want. â¢	Last but not least: Service! Yes, just read the comments in Google Play. You will receive the help you need and we want to hear from you all your comments and suggestions you may have to keep this Financial Manager app being the number ONE in the Market.

reviews.comment: Spensa pro is the most comprehensive, use friendly, colorful graphics I have cone across so far. After experimenting with many other applications I came across this one and im VERY happy. It does nit need anything else.  I can tell that all the bugs have been already iron out. If you start with this application,  you wont need anything else.
reviews.author: Jeanine Valenzuela

reviews.title: A good reason to stay with Android
reviews.comment: Been using this app for three weeks and now would be lost without it. Useability is excellent and there\'s impressive attention to detail. Tried at least a dozen financial apps but stuck with this as its definitely best of the bunch
reviews.author: Colin Loney

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Its great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for few months now and just updated to pro.  I don\'t usually but apps but this one will be worth it.
reviews.author: Kari Kindred

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app minor issue very quickly resolved thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its good but......
reviews.comment: The recurring transactions between devices, would be nice if they could sync too. Easier to see the households upcomming bills. Not all bills are mine! No other complains so far.
reviews.author: Dan Collins

reviews.title: Thanks for update
reviews.comment: Thanks for adding my currency. Its best expense tracker app now, Thank you very much.
reviews.author: Elgun Asgerov

reviews.title: Perfect everyday
reviews.comment: Almost perfect I mean. Won\'t sync to my dropbox account.  It says some app is trying to access and disabling it. But features wise have moved all my MS Money deluxe features here and it all seems to map out really well. Great app please fix cloud sync.
reviews.author: Aloys Mendoza

reviews.title: Great software
reviews.comment: One of the excellent software .Absolutely no issues so far .it\'s very useful for tracking expenses. Actually want to give 10 stars.
reviews.author: Ajay Phadke

reviews.title: Good start but too many bugs
reviews.comment: The functionality of the app is pretty good but there are a few issues with data not being shown consistently,  the reports are different each time you log in.   It seems that if they developers can sort these issues out then it will be a 5* app but they haven\'t yet replied to my questions
reviews.author: Karl Hart

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It is almost complete for the price. Except for a few items.   1. Tried importing my previous data into the app but it says account, category and sub-category not recognized. Also, it only managed to import 1010 transaction out of my 1333 transaction. It will only recognize its default accounts, category and sub-category. 2. App takes up the whole screen and if there is any notification, we must exit the app in order to view the notification. (no android drop down bar). 3. Needs a way to wipe all data.   I
reviews.author: Rosham Zulkarnain

reviews.title: Awesome application
reviews.comment: This is a really great financial app to keep track of your income and expenditures.  My only recommendations are having the ability to download more icons or create your own.
reviews.author: Carlos Lam Yang

reviews.title: Tracking professional expenses
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure if this app is going to help me track my professional expenses which was my primary reason for my purchase. I want to be able to import and categorize receipts. Can you please let me know where I can find this?
reviews.author: Kelly Zencka

reviews.title: How about an update??
reviews.comment: It would be nice if we could get an update to all the bugs and some of the imperfect functionality of the APP we just PAID for.
reviews.author: Omar Shuaib

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I have look at around 20 finance apps and I would have to say that this probably the best.
reviews.author: James Lawrence

reviews.title: No date entry flexibility.
reviews.comment: Scrolling month by month. Trying to enter/reconcile older stuff is a joke. Customer service is not. Do they even use this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: Great features, interface and functionality.
reviews.author: Gene Lucio

reviews.title: Don\'t get this
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t link to bank accounts. Why would I want to manually input transactions? This app is hassle and inferior to others.
reviews.author: Seth Taylor

reviews.title: putri
reviews.comment: receipt attachmt it would good if i can choose & attach multiple attachmts direct fm my photo gallery rather than hvg to snap it. most of the time i\'ll do my updates late at night so its quite troublesome hvg to dig all those receipts..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Loving it
reviews.author: Afeel Baharuddin
